projects.title: Calculator App
projects.subtitle: A functional calculator built with JavaScript
projects.description: A responsive calculator application that performs basic arithmetic operations. Features a clean UI design and handles edge cases like division by zero.

projects.title: Etch-a-Sketch
projects.subtitle: Digital drawing pad with customizable grid
projects.description: An interactive drawing application inspired by the classic Etch-a-Sketch toy. Users can draw by hovering over a grid with various color and size options.

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.subtitle: Pokemon information lookup tool
projects.description: A Pokemon database application that fetches data from the PokeAPI. Users can search for Pokemon and view detailed information including stats, types, and abilities.

projects.title: Pomodoro Timer
projects.subtitle: Productivity timer with break intervals
projects.description: A productivity tool based on the Pomodoro Technique. Features customizable work and break intervals, notifications, and session tracking.

projects.title: Todo List
projects.subtitle: Task management application
projects.description: A comprehensive task management app with features like adding, editing, deleting, and marking tasks as complete. Includes local storage for persistence.
